DOC.criteria: For information regard BristolMyers Squibb Clinical Trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Must histological confirmation advance and/or metastatic solid tumor expect express mesothelin Must receive either progress intolerant standard treatment regimen advance metastatic setting , therapy exists Must measurable tumor per Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) modify RECIST malignant pleural mesothelioma Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 1 Cancer metastasis brain Uncontrolled significant cardiovascular disease Moderate eye disorder Moderate peripheral neuropathy Known past active hepatitis B C infection Other protocol define inclusion/exclusion criterion could apply
